# tmp is on /dev/vda7
tmp UUID="32aac310-400d-400f-b775-1cc6efa1c737" /etc/luks-keys/tmp luks
# var is on /dev/vda8
var UUID="6f05656a-aee3-4c99-a77a-f36d1077070f" /etc/luks-keys/var luks
# srv is on /dev/vda9

# swap is on /dev/vda6

# root is on /dev/vda5
root UUID="0731eee7-4c41-4821-89af-517f9ce64eca" none luks
